text: Maymunah bint al-Harith al-Hilaliyah (Arabic: ميمونة بنت الحارث الهلالية, Maymūnah bint al-Ḥārith al-Hilālīyah, 594-63) was the wife of the last prophet of Islam, Muhammad. Her real name was Barrah, but Muhammad changed her name to Maymuna. == Other websites == * Al Islam Dictionary * Roots Web Category:594 births Category:674 deaths Category:Female Sahabah Category:Wives of Muhammad
title: Maymunah bint al-Harith
